Data Files

The following datasets are included in the repository:

Data Geographic Level Time Period Harmonization File Name Download Link

Local Elections Municipality 1990–2020 Yes municipal_harm CSV RDS

State Elections Municipality 2006–2019 Yes state_harm CSV RDS

Federal Elections Municipality 1980–2021 No federal_muni_unharm CSV RDS
Federal Elections Municipality 1990–2021 Yes federal_muni_harm CSV RDS

Federal Elections County 1990–2021 Yes federal_cty_harm CSV RDS
Crosswalks Municipality 1990–2021 — ags_crosswalks CSV RDS
Crosswalks County 1990–2021 — cty_crosswalks CSV RDS
Shapefiles Municipality/County 2000, 2021 — VG250_GEM / VG250_KRS 2000 2021

Crosswalk Covariates County 1990–2021 Yes cty_area_pop_emp CSV RDS

GERDA

  • GERDA
  • hhilbig@ucdavis.edu

    German Election Database -- Election results at the county and municipal level, for federal, state and local elections in Germany.
